website_summaries.verdict: The Puma ST Trainer EVO offers superb comfort and lightweight feeling for the foot. Its mesh upper allows breathability for the foot as well as giving a clean look for the shoe. The minimal design of the low-top sneaker gives off the classy appeal, making the shoe flexible when it comes to style. With a price that makes the wallet smile, the Puma ST Trainer EVO is clearly a great deal.
pros: A majority of the reviewers have praised the Puma ST Trainer EVO for the comfort it brings
The shoe displays a stylish look, according to a good number of buyers
A handful of users have expressed how this running-inspired shoe feels lightweight on foot
Some consumers have enjoyed the compliments they get from wearing the shoe
One reviewer has expressed how he/she is really satisfied with the shoe
Many buyers have loved how trendy the shoe is
This model of Puma sneakers is available in a variety of colorways is offered for the shoe
The shoe is offered at a rather affordable price
cons: Some of the reviewers are disappointed that the Puma ST Trainer EVO does not offer arch support
The sole comes off easily after a couple of use, according to a wearer

customer_reviews.title: Puma
customer_reviews.text: Too small and no arch support but they do look nice
customer_reviews.author: sparker

customer_reviews.title: For very narrow feet.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 12 year old son who has wide size 6.5 feet, these where extremely narrow even for a regular sized foot, have them to a nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte De La Pava

customer_reviews.title: Smashin
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoes, very light and comfortable they look amazing however I'm very protective over them so they don't get dirty. They look abit thin at first but they look good.
customer_reviews.author: hippothebear

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work because I walk a lot and they are very comfortable, for the price very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: sabeeha khan

customer_reviews.title: Great price, Look nice
customer_reviews.text: Great price, Look nice. Feel slightly tight compared to other 10.5 trainers I own. Bought them for work, only Worn them 7 times and the puma logo has started to come away on both sides, disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking trainer's for the money....
customer_reviews.text: Like the feeling on feet dislike the fact worn out fast
customer_reviews.author: Mark phiz

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didnt think it was puma originally materials seem so cheap
customer_reviews.author: john stewart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quite narrow around the arch, hugs the foot tight but not uncomfortable. still wear them daily
customer_reviews.author: andrew141

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the adhesive on the bottom of the shoe did not work to expectation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So light doesn't even feel like I'm wearing them! Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: dh03

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, i work as a waiter and i needed ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, i work as a waiter and i needed something comfortable and cheap. These are ideal,and they last for ages, they are 6 months old and have seen a lot of use and are still going. Bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so hopefully will be better appreciate by a
customer_reviews.text: Not really what my hobby likes, so hopefully will be better appreciate by a friend
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great and very stylish would recommend for anybody looking for comfort and style. ( not for sport)
customer_reviews.author: Edward Spicer

product_meta.title: PUMA St Trainer Evo, Unisex Adults’ Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description:
The PUMA st trainer Evo Sneaker was inspired by walking shoes and is perfect for everyday use but also for pairs of regular training sessions.
The upper material Mesh is sporty and breathable. The comfortable EVA (Ethylene-Vinyl Acetate) Zwischens Ohhle provides you with a very comfortable. The flexible rubber sole for a safer grip on the road, on the Promenade or in the park.
